snippet.title: My Indie Game - Star Life. Mini Gameplay Trailer.
snippet.description:
After several years of development, I finally have my own game upcoming on Steam. It is still a long road ahead, but I am extremely keen to share progress with you. Ahead of us are playtests, good news and fails, but I hope eventually those who liked sandbox game with heave economy gameplay and freedom of choice will be pleases. 

You can join Playtest or Wishlist game on Steam! store.steampowered.com/app/3305980/Star_Life/
